comments.body: Maybe add `register: result` to one of the examples and then a `debug` task to view the result (or parts of it). That makes it easier for not so experienced people to use the module.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +65,69 @@      - all
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
- name: show all information
  debug:
